snippet.title: The Ebbing - A Coastal Tale - Official Trailer - EN
snippet.description:
What began as a relaxing vacation in the picturesque coastal town of Havstedt turns into a nightmare when the murder of Bente Hansen shakes the community. For the community, the culprit is quickly identified - you.

Now it's up to you to prove your innocence and untangle a web of conspiracy, lies and secrets.

In this unique Detective RPG you have to choose how to solve the mystery:

- Exploration: Move freely in the town of Havstedt, a place on the coast of the North Sea in the 19th century.
- Information: Interrogate the villagers and search for clues
- Detective RPG: Use your detective sense to find hidden clues and clues.
- Combination: Combine information and findings into facts
- Confrontation: Confront the suspects and convict the perpetrators.
- Decisions: Your actions affect the course of the story, the inhabitants and your own fate.
- Level Up: Develop your character and level up your skills.
- Skill Checks: Use your stats in classic pen and paper skill checks.
Crafting: Gather resources and build items and consumables.
- Stealth: Sneak into places where you are not allowed to go.

Will you be able to get to the bottom of the eerie happenings in Havsted?



Dive into the captivating world of "The Ebbing - A Coastal Tale". Join us on a thrilling journey to 1870 as you take on the role of a detective and solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen in a quaint coastal town.

In this unique detective role-playing game, a challenging task lies ahead of you: prove your innocence and uncover the truth behind a web of conspiracies, lies and secrets. The fate of the community and your own future depend on whether you manage to solve the mystery that haunts Havstedt.

Explore the beautifully designed town of Havstedt, set on the coast of the North Sea in the 19th century. Immerse yourself in its rich atmosphere, interact with the villagers and diligently search for clues that will bring you closer to the truth. With your detective sense you'll discover hidden information and combine various pieces of evidence to bring important facts to light.

Prepare for intense confrontations as you interrogate suspects and convict perpetrators. Your decisions have immense impact, shaping the course of history, the lives of the inhabitants, and ultimately your own destiny. Develop your character, improve unique abilities, and face classic skill tests familiar from pen-and-paper role-playing games.

Crafting and resource gathering play an important role in your journey, allowing you to craft important items and consumables that support your investigations. Put your stealth skills to the test, sneak into forbidden places and discover hidden secrets that others have missed.

Are you ready to dive into the mysterious events in Havstedt? Can you uncover the truth and bring justice to those who deserve it? Join us on this exciting adventure where every decision you make will bring you closer to the breathtaking finale of The Ebbing - A Coastal Tale.

Subscribe to our channel and don't miss updates, gameplay tips and exciting reveals about this addictive detective experience. Get ready to become the detective you've always dreamed of!

Visit us:
https://activefungus-studios.de/
https://www.instagram.com/activefungus/
